derivation: a prolonged form of a primary verb;
strongs_def: to grow ("wax"), i.e. enlarge (literal or figurative, active or passive)
outline:
1. to cause to grow, augment
  2. to increase, become greater
  3. to grow, increase
    1. of plants
    2. of infants
    3. of a multitude of people
    4. of inward Christian growth
